channel.title: redistimeseries on Javagrunt
channel.description: Recent content in redistimeseries on Javagrunt

item.title: Forked Fork for Telegraf
item.description: The work In my homelab, I’m setting up RedisTimeSeries on a Raspberry Pi. I wanted to use Telegraf to deliver metrics from the Raspberry Pi to RedisTimeSeries. There was a function fork that had already submitted a PR. The PR was started in 2019! It recently had some additional feedback added to it, so I decided to implement some of the feedback. By creating a fork of the fork and creating a PR for the PR!

item.title: PR for redistimeseries-js issue 17
item.description: My friend, Dustin, has been doing to really cool stuff with RedisTimeSeries. He realized the new RedisTimeSeries features weren’t implemented in the client library he was using. I took a look at the library, and decided to create a PR. The issue had already been opened, so I went to work. Forked the repository, kept notes, asked for feedback. It was fun. Met HermitCode, lusket, siddhant_24 Archive
